## Bio

Connor Quiroz studies the role of seafood trade in affecting international climates and economies. His research focuses on disaggregating the climatic and social-economic risks embedded in seafood consumption, and providing that information to fishery suppliers and managers to buffer seafood production and minimize food security risks.
